Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Small vase with a flat base, prominent shoulder, small neck and an outward-folded lip. The exterior, which is of a brick-red colour, shows large numbers of tiny white specks which indicate the use of a mineral temper. The neck has been incised with a series of small horizontal lines.
